description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Practice your math while picking Apples from the Apple Orchard.   Fill the Apple Tree with 10 Apples and learn your score!
description.short: Practice your math while picking Apples from the Apple Orchard.   Fill the Apple Tree with 10 Apples and learn your score!
